title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1646-7.12 - Statement of initial operating period income and expense
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1646-7.12 - Statement of initial operating period income and expense

State Regulations

The requirements for reporting initial operating period
income and expense on form DH-621 and the adaptation and use of the form in
connection therewith have been described in subdivision (e) of section
1646-6.3. This statement shall be
furnished only where specifically requested by the division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1646-7.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
